item.title: Structure, Layout, Goose!
item.description:
Let’s break down account frameworks and formats in Microsoft Dynamics GP. Account Framework: The Big Picture Think of the account framework as the maximum size for your chart of accounts. It’s set during the initial Dynamics GP installation, even before all the details are finalized. This is important because changing it later is a hassle. The framework impacts all companies within your Dynamics GP system, so consider everyone’s needs. Technically, it can have up to 66 characters and 10 segments, but there are storage limits detailed in the installation guide...
